PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1994-02711994-02-160,  ,  ,  ,  FIN, 
PrecisAmendments to the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS that add three new kinds of medical devices or equipment to the list of those which are eligible for the medical expense tax credit, as follows: . 1. Air and water filters or purifiers 2. Electric or sealed combustion furnaces acquired to replace furnaces of another type 3. Visual or vibratory signalling devices (such as visual fire alarm indicators. .
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1994-0189 Publication Date: 1994-03-09
Attachments
